configurable.i18n_name: TAILORED CROPPED SKINNY DIRTY LIGHT DRILL STRETCH AMBER BROWN

configurable.i18n_description: The Tailored Cropped Skinny Dirty Light Drill Stretch Amber Brown is A very expensive brand’s super-stretch skinny fit jean for women with a cropped leg. Characterised by its minimal detailing and clean pockets, The Skinny has a comfortable rise with a slim, sexy and fitted silhouette, with zips at the cropped ankle injecting a punk-inspired edge. Constructed on 7FAM’s wonderfully lightweight Light Drill Stretch fabric, this youthful design is incredibly comfortable and easy to wear. Amber Brown takes its fashion cue from the new naturals palette, with warm tones inspired by nature leading the coloured denim trend. With its ankle zips and slightly dirty effect on the fabric’s surface, this style nails hard-edged cool.
configurable.i18n_description_de:
• Die Tailored Cropped Skinny Dirty Light Drill Stretch Amber Brown ist A very expensive brands Cropped Superstretch Skinny Fit
  • minimale Details und freie Taschen
  • komfortable Leibhöhe mit schmalem, sexy und anliegendem Schnitt
  • mit Reißverschlüssen am gekürzten Knöchel für einen punkinspirierten Look
  • besteht aus 7FAMs wunderbar leichtem Light Drill Stretch
  • jugendliches Design, unheimlich bequem und tragefreundlich
  • Amber Brown ist von der neuen Naturtonpalette inspiriert, bei der warme Töne aus der Natur den Trend für farbigen Denim beherrschen
  • Reißverschlüsse am Knöchel und leichter Dirty-Effekt an der Oberfläche
  • dieser Style bringt kantige Coolness in Ihr Leben
configurable.i18n_description_nl: De Tailored Cropped Skinny Dirty Light Drill Stretch Amber Brown is het superstretch skinny fit caprimodel voor vrouwen van A very expensive brand. De Skinny wordt gekenmerkt door minimale details en sobere zakken en heeft een comfortabele heuplijn met een slank, sexy en aansluitend silhouet. Onder aan de enkel zorgen ritsen voor een punkdetail. Dit jeugdige design, uitgevoerd in de prachtig lichte Light Drill Stretch-stof van 7FAM, zit ongelooflijk comfortabel en is gemakkelijk te dragen. Amber Brown haalt z'n fashioninspiratie uit het nieuwe natuurlijke kleurenpalet met warme tinten geïnspireerd op de natuur die de denimtrend domineren. De enkelritsen en het ietwat vuile effect op de stof zorgen voor een coole, stoere look.
configurable.i18n_description_fr: Avec sa coupe ajustée, le Skinny Dirty Light Drill Stretch version Amber Brown est le modèle skinny court et ultra-stretch de A very expensive brand. Caractérisé par ses détails raffinés et ses poches clean, le Skinny est confortable à la taille avec une coupe moulante très sexy qui épouse à merveille la silhouette. Les zips aux chevilles apportent une touche punk rock à l’ensemble. Taillé dans le tissu stretch Light Drill si léger de 7FAM, ce modèle jeune est ultra-confortable et très facile à porter. Le lavage Amber Brown s’inspire de la palette de couleurs naturelles de la saison, avec des tons chauds au top de la tendance denim. Ses zips aux chevilles et son aspect légèrement sali viennent parfaire son style rock et branché.
configurable.i18n_description_it: Tailored Cropped Skinny Dirty Light Drill Stretch Amber Brown è uno skinny da donna ultra stretch con gamba corta, firmato A very expensive brand. Il modello Skinny, con dettagli minimal e tasche dalle linee pulite, ha una vita confortevole e disegna una figura sexy e sottile. Le zip alla caviglia offrono un tocco punk. Il leggerissimo tessuto Light Drill Stretch lo rende giovanile, incredibilmente confortevole e facile da indossare. Amber Brown arricchisce una nuova palette dai toni caldi ispirata alla natura... Il denim colorato fa tendenza! Con le zip alla caviglia e l’effetto dirty, il look grintoso è garantito.
configurable.i18n_description_es: The Tailored Cropped Skinny Dirty Light Drill Stretch Amber Brown is A very expensive brand’s super-stretch skinny fit jean for women with a cropped leg. Characterised by its minimal detailing and clean pockets, The Skinny has a comfortable rise with a slim, sexy and fitted silhouette, with zips at the cropped ankle injecting a punk-inspired edge. Constructed on 7FAM’s wonderfully lightweight Light Drill Stretch fabric, this youthful design is incredibly comfortable and easy to wear. Amber Brown takes its fashion cue from the new naturals palette, with warm tones inspired by nature leading the coloured denim trend. With its ankle zips and slightly dirty effect on the fabric’s surface, this style nails hard-edged cool.
